title: Audius Music
description: Music Plug-in utilizing the Audius API to stream music from the Audius network within your game.
longDescription:
• Audius is a music community and discovery platform that puts the artist in control.
  • It does this by being fully decentralized: Audius is owned and run by a vibrant, open-source community of artists, fans, and developers all around the world. Audius gives artists the power to share never-before-heard music and monetize streams directly. Developers can build their own apps on top of Audius, giving them access to one of the most unique audio catalogs in existence. 
  • Since the Audius platform is free to use at a base level, the community wanted to create this plug-in for indie game developers to utilize free music within their creations as they are learning the craft. This project will receive updates throughout the future to continuous be functional within the latest versions of unreal engine. Thanks for using the Audius plug-in! Happy streaming!
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Stream Audius Tracks
  • Stream Audius Playlists 
  • Stream Audius Trending
  •  Stream Audius Trending Underground
  • Search Audius for Tracks 


Code Modules:

  •  Audius (Runtime) 


Number of Streamable Tacks: 1 million +

Sample rate / bit rate: 48,000Hz/320 Kbps

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 3 million +


Number of Blueprints: 2

Number of C++ Classes: 8

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms: Linux, Mac, Windows

Supported Target Build Platforms: Android, IOS, Linux, Mac, Windows

Documentation: https://github.com/DigiKrafting/Audius_Unreal_Plugin

Example Project: https://github.com/DigiKrafting/Audius_Unreal_Plugin

More information: https://audius.org | https://audius.co
